Watchful Strike.name: Watchful Strike
Watchful Strike.flavor: As you strike your foe, you place another foe under your aegis.
Watchful Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage. One enemy within 5 squares of you other than the target is marked until the end of your next turn.
Watchful Strike.aegisOfAssault: The enemy you mark is marked by your aegis of assault and takes damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Silversteel Veil.name: Silversteel Veil
Silversteel Veil.flavor: You raise a magical ward of thin, wispy silver mist. It seems no more tangible than warm breath on a frosty morning, but it gathers under enemy blows and turns them aside.
Silversteel Veil.targets: You and each ally in the burst
Silversteel Veil.effect: All affected creatures gain a +2 bonus to AC and Reflex defense until the end of your next turn.

Sword Burst.name: Sword Burst
Sword Burst.flavor: A sweep of your sword blasts those around you with force.
Sword Burst.onHit:
1d6 + Intelligence modifier force damage.
Increase damage to 2d6 + Intelligence modifier at 21st level.

Lightning Clash.name: Lightning Clash
Lightning Clash.flavor: As your blade strikes home, a sizzling bolt of lightning leaps from your reeling foe to strike down its nearby ally.
Lightning Clash.onHit: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier damage. Make a secondary attack.
Lightning Clash.secondaryTarget: One creature within 5 squares of the primary target.

Foesnare.name: Foesnare
Foesnare.flavor: You cut into your foe, and links of solid eldritch energy burst from its flesh, binding its bones to the ground.
Foesnare.onHit: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Foesnare.special: You can use this power in place of a melee basic attack when charging.

Greenflame Blade.name: Greenflame Blade
Greenflame Blade.flavor: Each blow ignites your blade in deadly green fire.
Greenflame Blade.onHit:
1[W] + Intelligence modifier fire damage, and you deal fire damage equal to your Strength modifier to all enemies adjacent to the target.
Increase damage to 2[W] + Intelligence modifier at 21st level.

Booming Blade.name: Booming Blade
Booming Blade.flavor: A field of sound punishes your enemy if he tries to escape.
Booming Blade.onHit:
1[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and if the target is adjacent to you at the start of its next turn and moves away during that turn, it takes 1d6 + Constitution modifier thunder damage.
Increase damage to 2[W] + Intelligence modifier at 21st level.

Isolating Slam.name: Isolating Slam
Isolating Slam.flavor: As your blade slices into the enemy before you, a tide of magical energy slams into nearby foes and rocks them back like ships on a stormy wave.
Isolating Slam.onHit: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier damage. Make a secondary attack.
Isolating Slam.secondaryTarget: Each enemy adjacent to the primary target
Isolating Slam.secondaryAttack: Intelligence vs. Fortitude, one attack per target
Isolating Slam.secondaryOnHit: You push the secondary target away from the primary target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.

Blastback Swipe.name: Blastback Swipe
Blastback Swipe.flavor: Your sword rings against your foe like a clap of thunder, sending your enemy careening away.
Blastback Swipe.onHit: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier thunder damage, and you push the target 2 squares.
Blastback Swipe.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.
Blastback Swipe.aegisOfAssault: When you use your aegis of assault immediate reaction, you can use this power in place of the melee basic attack.

Swordshock.name: Swordshock
Swordshock.flavor: Electric death pulses from your sword as you plunge it into the enemy.

Sloth Strike.name: Sloth Strike
Sloth Strike.flavor: As your blade sinks into the enemy, his blood turns to leaden ice, and he staggers about heavily.
Sloth Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier cold damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Spidersilk Slash.name: Spidersilk Slash
Spidersilk Slash.flavor: You spin your blade impossibly fast, creating silvery strands of silk that bind nearby enemies.
Spidersilk Slash.onHit: 1d10 + Intelligence modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Chilling Blow.name: Chilling Blow
Chilling Blow.flavor: Your blade rips into your foe and cold pulses from the wound,  enveloping your enemyâ€™s body in a crust of frost.
Chilling Blow.onHit: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier cold damage, and the target takes cold damage equal to your Constitution modifier each time it attacks until the start of your next turn.

Acid Burst Blade.name: Acid Burst Blade
Acid Burst Blade.flavor: Your blade turns into acid mid-swing, splattering against your foe and splashing a flesh-searnig spray on nearby enemies.
Acid Burst Blade.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier acid damage, and enemies adjacent to the target take 1d6 + Strength modifier acid damage.
Acid Burst Blade.aegisOfAssault: When you use your aegis of assault immediate reaction, you can use this power in place of melee basic attack.

Ice Cage.name: Ice Cage
Ice Cage.flavor: As your blade lances into your foe, ice erupts from the wound, winding around your enemy's limbs in a crushing embrace.
Ice Cage.onHit: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn. If the target attacks while it is weakened, it takes cold damage equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier.

Transposing Lunge.name: Transposing Lunge
Transposing Lunge.flavor: You thrust at your enemy, a flash engulfs it, and it suddenly appears elsewhere.
Transposing Lunge.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and you teleport the target into a space adjacent to you.
Transposing Lunge.aegisOfShielding: When you use your aegis of shielding immediate interrupt, you can use this power against the target as part of the interrupt, even if the target is beyond your reach.

Meteor Strike.name: Meteor Strike
Meteor Strike.flavor: Your blade transforms mid-swing into a searing meteor that explodes against your enemy, then careens into other nearby foes, immolatting them in a fiery shroud.
Meteor Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier fire damage. Make a secondary attack.
Meteor Strike.secondaryTargets: One or two other creatures within a number of squares from the primary target equal to 2 + your Strength modifier
Meteor Strike.secondaryAttack: Intelligence vs. Reflex, one attack per target
Meteor Strike.secondaryOnHit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier + Strength modifier fire damage.
Meteor Strike.aegisOfAssault: When you use your aegis of assault immediate reaction, you can use this power in place of the melee basic attack.

Flamewall Strike.name: Flamewall Strike
Flamewall Strike.flavor: With a mighty sweep of your blade, dancing tongues of arcane fire rise from the ground at the feet of your foes.
Flamewall Strike.effect:
You conjure a wall of contiguous squares filled with leaping flames that lasts until the start of your next turn. The wall can be 3 squares long and no more than 1 square high. Only 1 square of the wall must be within 1 square of you.
    Any creature that enters the wallâ€™s space or starts its turn there takes 1d8 + Constitution modifier fire damage. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

Lightning Lure.name: Lightning Lure
Lightning Lure.flavor: You lasso your foe with a leash of lightning, and pull it into range of your blade.
Lightning Lure.onHit:
1d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage, and you pull the target to the nearest unoccupied space adjacent to you.
Increase damage to 2d6 + Intelligence modifier at 21st level.
Lightning Lure.special: If you cannot pull the target to an adjacent square, this power fails and deals no damage.

Falcon's Mark.name: Falcon's Mark
Falcon's Mark.flavor: You send your weapon flying to seek out an enemy beyond your normal reach. Your magic then marks that creature as your foe.
Falcon's Mark.requirement: You must throw your melee weapon at the target.
Falcon's Mark.onHit: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier force damage, and the target is marked until the end of your next turn.
Falcon's Mark.aegisOfEnsnarement: You can instead mark the target with your aegis of ensnarement power. Marking the target does not remove the mark on another target affected by your aegis of ensnarement. The mark lasts until the end of your next turn.
Falcon's Mark.effect: Your weapon returns to your hand.

Blazing Pursuit.name: Blazing Pursuit
Blazing Pursuit.flavor: You envelop your blade in fire and then strike. The flames create a lingering path that you can travel along to catch your escaping foe.
Blazing Pursuit.onHit: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier fire damage. If the target is within 5 squares of you at the end of its next turn, as a free action you can teleport to a space that must be adjacent to the target.
Blazing Pursuit.aegisOfAssault: You can teleport to a space adjacent to the target even if you do not have line of sight to that space.

Blink Assault.name: Blink Assault
Blink Assault.flavor: In the blink of an eye, you and an ally appear next to a foe and unleash a deadly assault.
Blink Assault.effect: Before the attack, you and an ally who is adjacent to you teleport 5 squares to spaces that must be adjacent to the target.

Dragon's Teeth.name: Dragon's Teeth
Dragon's Teeth.flavor: When you strike, darts of force explode from your weapon. The shards dig into your foesâ€™ flesh, goading them to move in your direction.
Dragon's Teeth.onHit: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier force damage. The target takes damage equal to your Strength modifier if it does not end its turn adjacent to you (save ends).

Lashing Asp.name: Lashing Asp
Lashing Asp.flavor: A spectral asp winds itself around your sword. With each successful strike you make, the asp lunges to attack nearby foes.
Lashing Asp.effect: Until the stance ends, whenever you hit an enemy with a melee attack, each enemy adjacent to the target of that attack takes poison damage equal to your Constitution modifier. Also, whenever you hit an enemy marked by your Swordmage Aegis power with a melee attack, it takes poison damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Eldritch Chains.name: Eldritch Chains
Eldritch Chains.flavor: Spectral chains lash outward from your weapon, striking at your enemies before binding them in place.
Eldritch Chains.onHit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier force damage. Until the end of the encounter, whenever you end your turn adjacent to the target, the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Eldritch Chains.effect: The target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Swordmage's Decree.name: Swordmage's Decree
Swordmage's Decree.flavor: Speaking ancient words of aegis binding, you lower a mantle of magic over your enemies that marks them as your foes.
Swordmage's Decree.effect: The target is marked by your Swordmage Aegis power. Marking the target does not remove the mark on another target already affected by your Swordmage Aegis. If you mark only one target with this power, you do not expend the power but cannot use it again during this encounter.

Unerring Vision.name: Unerring Vision
Unerring Vision.flavor: Your eyes glow silver, piercing the veils that separate you and your opponent.
Unerring Vision.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you are automatically aware of each creature within 5 squares of you, including those that are hidden or invisible. You know the squares that any of those creatures occupy, but this knowledge does not negate the effects of cover, superior cover, concealment, or total concealment.

Aegis of Lost Souls.name: Aegis of Lost Souls
Aegis of Lost Souls.flavor: As one of your foes falls, you send out a pulse of magic that incites other enemies to attack you.
Aegis of Lost Souls.range: Area burst 2 centered on the triggering enemy
Aegis of Lost Souls.trigger: An enemy within 10 squares of you drops to 0 hit points
Aegis of Lost Souls.effect: The target is marked by your Swordmage Aegis power. Marking the target does not remove the mark on another target already affected by your Swordmage Aegis. Using this power does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Zephyr of the Barren Sands.name: Zephyr of the Barren Sands
Zephyr of the Barren Sands.flavor: You channel the power of the desert winds to briefly lift you into the air.
Zephyr of the Barren Sands.effect: You fly a number of squares equal to your speed.

Aegis of Assault.name: Aegis of Assault
Aegis of Assault.sourceRef: Forgotten Realms Player's Guide, Player's Handbook 3
Aegis of Assault.flavor: You create an arcane link between you and a foe, allowing you to instantly respond to its attacks with a counterassault.
Aegis of Assault.effect:
You mark the target. The target remains marked until you use this power against another target. If you mark other creatures using other powers, the target is still marked. A creature can be subject to only one mark at a time. A new mark supersedes a mark that was already in place.
    If your marked target makes an attack that doesnâ€™t include you as a target, it takes a â€“2 penalty to attack rolls. If that attack hits and the marked target is within 10 squares of you, you can use an immediate reaction to teleport to a square adjacent to the target and make a melee basic attack against it. If no unoccupied space exists adjacent to the target, you canâ€™t use this immediate reaction.

Aegis of Shielding.name: Aegis of Shielding
Aegis of Shielding.sourceRef: Forgotten Realms Player's Guide, Player's Handbook 3
Aegis of Shielding.flavor: You create an arcane link between you and an enemy, allowing you to blunt its attacks against your allies.
Aegis of Shielding.effect:
You mark the target. The target remains marked until you use this power against another target. If you mark other creatures using other powers, the target is still marked. A creature can be subject to only one mark at a time. A new mark supersedes a mark that was already in place.
    If your marked target makes an attack that doesnâ€™t include you as a target, it takes a â€“2 penalty to attack rolls. If that attack hits and the marked target is within 10 squares of you, you can use an immediate interrupt to reduce the damage dealt by that attack to any one creature by an amount equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier.
At 11th level, reduce the damage dealt by 10 + your Constitution modifier. At 21st level, reduce the damage dealt by 15 + your Constitution modifier.

Flame Cyclone.name: Flame Cyclone
Flame Cyclone.flavor: Arcane power swirls around your blade and outward toward your enemies, engulfing them in an inferno.
Flame Cyclone.onHit: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier + Strength modifier fire damage.

Burning Blade.name: Burning Blade
Burning Blade.flavor: Your fiery blade lunges toward your enemy, and its arcane warmth seeks to flare again in the wounds of your foes.
Burning Blade.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your melee attacks deal extra fire damage equal to your Strength modifier

Frost Backlash.name: Frost Backlash
Frost Backlash.flavor: As your enemy swings for the kill, your warding suddenly turns to ice and lashes out at your foe with the fury of winter.

Whirling Blade.name: Whirling Blade
Whirling Blade.flavor: You spin and suddenly hurl your sword. Your blade spins in the air, seeking an enemy to slash with mortal determination.
Whirling Blade.requirement: You must throw your melee weapon at the target.
Whirling Blade.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and your weapon returns to your hand.
Whirling Blade.onMiss: Repeat the attack against a second target within 5 squares of the first. If you miss, repeat the attack against a third target within 5 squares of the second. If you miss again, repeat the attack against a fourth target within 5 squares of the third. Your weapon then returns to your hand.

Eldritch Speed.name: Eldritch Speed
Eldritch Speed.flavor: Eldritch power flows in your blood, and when battle is joined, the power speeds you on.
Eldritch Speed.effect: Use this power before rolling initiative. You gain a +5 power bonus to your initiative roll. You can take an extra move action during the first round of combat (or during the surprise round, if you are allowed to act during that round).

Fear No Elements.name: Fear No Elements
Fear No Elements.flavor: The elements of the universe are yours to command, and they do not easily damage you.
Fear No Elements.effect: Choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. Until the end of the encounter, you gain resist 5 + your Constitution modifier to that damage type.

Mythal Recovery.name: Mythal Recovery
Mythal Recovery.flavor: You focus your warding inward to bolster yourself against the onslaught.
Mythal Recovery.effect: Make a saving throw against an effect that a save can end.

Corrosive Ruin.name: Corrosive Ruin
Corrosive Ruin.flavor: You spin your blade in a tight circle in front of you, assailing foes with a spray of flesh-melting acid.

Deep Freeze.name: Deep Freeze
Deep Freeze.flavor: Driving your blade home, you hiss a word of power , and white bone-chililng mist begins to seep from your foe's body.
Deep Freeze.effect: until the end of the encounter, any enemy takes 1d10 cold damage when it moves adjacent to or starts its turn adjacent to the target.

Elemental Foible.name: Elemental Foible
Elemental Foible.flavor: You weave a deadly symbol in your foe's flesh. This hateful glyph leaves your enemy's body fragile to the elements.
Elemental Foible.effect: The target gains vulnerable 5 to a damage type of your choice: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. The vulnerability lasts until the end of the encounter.

Lingering Lightning.name: Lingering Lightning
Lingering Lightning.flavor: Tendrils of bluish white lightning course from your blade to electrocute your enemies.
Lingering Lightning.attack: Intelligence vs. Reflex, one attack per target
Lingering Lightning.onHit: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier damage, and ongoing 5 lightning damage (save ends).
Lingering Lightning.onMiss: Half damage, and no ongoing damage.

Armathor's Step.name: Armathor's Step
Armathor's Step.flavor: Arcane power speeds you into battle.
Armathor's Step.effect: Teleport 5 squares. If you end this move adjacent to an enemy, you gain a +2 power bonus to the next attack roll you make against that enemy during your turn.

Dimensional Warding.name: Dimensional Warding
Dimensional Warding.flavor: Your warding warps the flow of magic around you, preventing enemies from sneaky escapes or attacks.
Dimensional Warding.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts as long as the stance persists. Enemies within the zone cannot teleport. Enemies outside the zone cannot teleport into it.
Dimensional Warding.special: The zone remains centered on you, even if you move.

Fate-Spurned Foe.name: Fate-Spurned Foe
Fate-Spurned Foe.flavor: Forces beyond your enemyâ€™s comprehension work against it at your command.
Fate-Spurned Foe.effect: Until the end of the encounter, any effect that a save can end that you place on an enemy causes a â€“2 penalty to saving throws against the effect.

Electrified Lash.name: Electrified Lash
Electrified Lash.flavor: You point your sword into the air, and cruel talons of white lightning reach out toward your foes.

Spikes of Agony.name: Spikes of Agony
Spikes of Agony.flavor: Your strike leaves shards of pure force piercing your enemyâ€™s flesh, rending it if it moves.
Spikes of Agony.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier force damage. If the target moves before the end of its next turn, it takes force damage equal to 5 + your Strength modifier.
Spikes of Agony.aegisOfAssault: When you use your aegis of assault immediate reaction, you can use this power in place of the melee basic attack.

Beacon Blade.name: Beacon Blade
Beacon Blade.flavor: As you slash at your foe, your sword glows with a blinding light, banishing the gloom around you.
Beacon Blade.onHit: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and the target is blinded (save ends).
Beacon Blade.effect: The target is illuminated untl the end of the encounter, shedding bright light within 10 squares around it. Even if it turns invisible, its location can be pinpointed automatically, though the normal -5 penalty to the attack roll still applies.

Be Gone.name: Be Gone
Be Gone.flavor: Your backhanded strike sends your enemey elsewhere.
Be Gone.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and you teleport the target 5 squares.

Glamor Blade.name: Glamor Blade
Glamor Blade.flavor: As you cut into your foe, the air shimmers around you for a split second, and then two of you stand before the enemy.
Glamor Blade.effect:
You conjure a duplicate of yourself on a solid surface in a square adjacent to the target. The duplicate lasts until the end of the encounter or until you drop to 0 hit points or fewer. Enemies cannot move through the duplicateâ€™s space, but allies can. The duplicate disappears if you end any turn more than 5 squares away from it.
    You and the duplicate share your statistics and actions. Actions the duplicate takes come from your normal allotment of actions, and it can take any actions normally available to you. You can make attacks, including opportunity attacks, as though you occupied the same space as the duplicate. The duplicate can be targeted by attacks and provokes opportunity attacks. Any effect that targets you and the duplicate affects you only once.

Arcane Awareness.name: Arcane Awareness
Arcane Awareness.flavor: Arcane power guides your defensive posture, guarding you even from attacks you canâ€™t see coming.
Arcane Awareness.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you do not grant combat advantage to any of your enemies.

Dimensional Dodge.name: Dimensional Dodge
Dimensional Dodge.flavor: As the enemy prepares to riddle you with arrows from afar, you vanish and reappear right next to it.
Dimensional Dodge.trigger: An enemy within 20 squares of you hits you with a ranged attack.
Dimensional Dodge.effect: You teleport adjacent to the enemy.

Impenetrable Warding.name: Impenetrable Warding
Impenetrable Warding.flavor: The air shimmers about you and thickens against enemy assault. The mythal protects you, always.
Impenetrable Warding.effect: Your warding provides its bonus to all your defenses, not just AC.

Dimensional Slash.name: Dimensional Slash
Dimensional Slash.flavor: As you slash your foe, your blade cuts atear in reality, which drags you and your foe to a new location nearby.
Dimensional Slash.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage. Teleport yourself and your target anumber of squares equal to 1 + your Constitution modifier. You must appear in a square adjacent to the target.

Seed of Fire.name: Seed of Fire
Seed of Fire.flavor: Your attack leaves a glowing mote of arcane power in your enemy's wound. You kick you foe free of your blade and watch it erupt in a blossom of hellish flames.
Seed of Fire.onHit: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier + 2. Make a secondary attack.
Seed of Fire.secondaryTarget: Each creature within 2 squares of the primary target's new location
Seed of Fire.aegisOfShielding: The secondary attack affects only enemies.

Acid for Blood.name: Acid for Blood
Acid for Blood.flavor: As your blade bites into your foe, you shisper a fell word of power and watch as your enemy's flesh begins to sizzle.
Acid for Blood.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and ongoing 10 acid damage (save ends).
Acid for Blood.onMiss: Half damage, and no ongoing damage.

Inferno's Sword.name: Inferno's Sword
Inferno's Sword.flavor: With a daring flourish of your blade, you unleash a blast of fire that dances madly about, setting your foes aflame.
Inferno's Sword.onHit: 2d10 + Intelligence modifier fire damage, and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).
Inferno's Sword.onMiss: Half damage, and no ongoing damage.

Free the Storm Within.name: Free the Storm Within
Free the Storm Within.flavor: You focus your fury, unleashing a storm around you that threatens retreating foes.
Free the Storm Within.effect: An enemy that starts its turn adjacent to you and moves away takes 2d8 lightning and thunder damage.

Bolstering Warding.name: Bolstering Warding
Bolstering Warding.flavor: The warding around you emits a soothing glow, restoring your vitality.
Bolstering Warding.effect: At the end of your turn, before making saving throws, remove one effect on yourself that a save can end.

Elemental Protection.name: Elemental Protection
Elemental Protection.flavor: You wrap layers of arcane protection into your warding, keeping elemental energy at bay.
Elemental Protection.effect: Choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. Until the end of the encounter, you gain resist 10 + your Constitution modifier to that damage type.

Ironskin.name: Ironskin
Ironskin.flavor: Your skin takes on a silvery sheen, and your muscles grow dense as steel.
Ironskin.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain resist 5 to all damage.

Sudden Escape.name: Sudden Escape
Sudden Escape.flavor: In the blink of an eye, you're somewhere else.
Sudden Escape.trigger: You would be hit by an attack

Bane Blade.name: Bane Blade
Bane Blade.flavor: Attuning your blade's arcane might, you launch a devastating barrage of cuts and thrusts against your foe.
Bane Blade.effect: Choose a creature type that the target has (animate, beast, humanoid, or magical beast). Until the end of the encounter, your attacks against creatures of that type deal 2d6 extra damage.

Hell's Own Blade.name: Hell's Own Blade
Hell's Own Blade.flavor: You hurl your sword, and it buries itself into the chest of a distant foe. Your sword explodes, sending waves of roiling flame out in all directions, before reforming in your hand.
Hell's Own Blade.secondaryTargets: The primary target and each enemy within 2 squares of it

Lightning Rod.name: Lightning Rod
Lightning Rod.flavor: Thrusting the point of your sword into your enemy, you channel a kernel of deadly power into it. Dark cloudsd seep from the wound and lightning lashes out, shocking nearby foes.
Lightning Rod.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and ongoing 10 lightning damage (save ends). When the target takes ongoing damage from this power, enemies adjacent to the target take 10 lightning damage.
Lightning Rod.onMiss: Half damage, and no ongoing damage.

Eyes of the Mage.name: Eyes of the Mage
Eyes of the Mage.flavor: Your eyes take on an otherworldly sheenâ€”you see all, even gaining a glimpse of the future.
Eyes of the Mage.effect:
Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +5 power bonus to Perception checks, you ignore attack penalties for targets that have concealment or total concealment, and you can see invisible targets as if they were visible.
    While this power is active, you can force an enemy within line of sight to reroll an attack roll made against you or an ally, with a penalty equal to your Constitution modifier. The enemy must use the new result. Using this benefit ends the powerâ€™s effects immediately.

Giant's Might.name: Giant's Might
Giant's Might.flavor: Soaking up ambient arcane power, your body swells and grows. You stand as tall as a giant and are blessed with awesome power.
Giant's Might.effect:
Your size category becomes the next larger one, such as from Medium to Large. You gain a +5 power bonus to Strength ability checks, a +2 power bonus to melee attack rolls, and a +5 power bonus to melee damage rolls.
    If this power increases your size to Large, Huge, or Colossal, your space increases to match the new size and your reach also increases by 1. If there is insufficient room for your space to increase, this power automatically fails.
    This transformation persists until the end of the encounter or until you choose to end it as a minor aciton.

Shackled Warding.name: Shackled Warding
Shackled Warding.flavor: A numbus of energy cascades from you and surrounds your foes, sealing their avenues of escape.
Shackled Warding.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts as long as the stance persists. Enemies wtihin the zone cannot teleport. Enemies outside the zone cannot teleport into it. Enemies who begin their turn within the zone are slowed untl the end of their turn.
Shackled Warding.special: The zone remains centered on you, even if you move.

Thunder Riposte.name: Thunder Riposte
Thunder Riposte.flavor: You reply to an enemy attack by unleashing a devastating blast of thunder from your blade.
Thunder Riposte.trigger: An adjacent creature hits you with an attack
Thunder Riposte.target: Each creature in the blast. The creature that triggered this power must be in the area of the blast.
Thunder Riposte.onHit: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier thunder damage, and the target is knocked prone and dazed until the end of your next turn.
Thunder Riposte.aegisOfShielding: When you use your aegis of shielding immediate interrupt, you can use this power as part of that action. The blast can originate from an ally targeted by the marked attacker. The marked attacker must be within the blast.

Bounding Lightning.name: Bounding Lightning
Bounding Lightning.flavor: As you hurl your blade, it flashes into a bolt of lightning, leaping from foe to foe before returning to your hand.
Bounding Lightning.effect: If a second enemy is within 5 squares of the target, make a secondary attack against that enemy.
Bounding Lightning.secondaryeffect: If a third enemy is within 5 squares of the target, make a tertiary attack against that enemy.

Icy Shackles.name: Icy Shackles
Icy Shackles.flavor: As you drive your blade home, glowing frost courses through your foe, encircling its limbs and anchoring it to the ground.
Icy Shackles.onHit: 4[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and ongoing 10 cold damage (save ends). Each time the target takes a move action before it has saved against the ongoing cold damage, the target takes extra cold damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Thundering Heart.name: Thundering Heart
Thundering Heart.flavor: You send your enemy reeling toward other foes as its heartbeat builds to a thunderous crescendo, which explodes with waves of power.
Thundering Heart.onHit: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to 1 + your Strength modifier. Make a secondary attack.
Thundering Heart.secondaryTarget: Each creature within 2 squares of the primary target, one attack per target

Maelstrom Blade.name: Maelstrom Blade
Maelstrom Blade.flavor: Weaving threads of arcane power into a mighty storm with the movements of your blade, you unleash elemental fury on your foes.
Maelstrom Blade.onHit: 3[W] + Intelligence modifier fire, lightning and thunder damage.
Maelstrom Blade.aegisOfAssault: When you use your aegis of assault immediate reaction, you can use this power in place of the melee basic attack.

Circle of Devastation.name: Circle of Devastation
Circle of Devastation.flavor: Whirling your blade about you, you throw off rending surges of arcane power, shredding foes and sending them flying.
Circle of Devastation.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you push the target 3 squares.
Circle of Devastation.aegisOfShielding: When you use your aegis of shielding immediate interrupt, you can use this power as part of that action. Instead of you being the center of the burst, choose an ally targeted by the attack that triggered your aegis of shielding. That ally is the center of the burst.

Dimensional Charge.name: Dimensional Charge
Dimensional Charge.flavor: Your blade opens a rift in reality, and you leap through to attack your enemy.
keywords: Arcane, Fire, Lightning, Teleportation, Thunder, Weapon
Dimensional Charge.effect: Before making the attack, you can teleport 10 squares to a space adjacent to the target. If you do, the attack is a charge.
Dimensional Charge.onHit: 4[W] + Intelligence modifier fire, lightning, and thunder damage.

Astral Thunder Blade.name: Astral Thunder Blade
Astral Thunder Blade.flavor: Your blade crashes down on your foe, and a noise like a god's fury bursts out of your enemy toward its allies.
Astral Thunder Blade.secondaryTarget: The primary target and each enemy within 2 squares of it.
Astral Thunder Blade.secondaryOnHit: 2d8 thunder damage, and the target is stunned until the start of your next turn.
Astral Thunder Blade.secondaryOnMiss: No damage or stun, but the secondary target is dazed until the start of your next turn.

Obliterating Blaze.name: Obliterating Blaze
Obliterating Blaze.flavor: With a vicious thrust of your sword, you set off a flaming chain reaction within your foe.
Obliterating Blaze.effect: Arcane fire continually burns in your target's veins. When the target is reduced to 0 hit points or fewer (if this happens before the end of the encounter), make a secondary attack.
Obliterating Blaze.secondaryTarget: Each enemy within 2 squares of the primary target

Vorpal Doom.name: Vorpal Doom
Vorpal Doom.flavor: Your weapon becomes razor-sharp and takes on a silvery sheen.
Vorpal Doom.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your melee attacks with this weapon, including this attack, can score critical hits if you attack roll is a natural 19 or 20.

Crackling Burst.name: Crackling Burst
Crackling Burst.flavor: Your weapon sends out sprawling arcs of lightning that hit nearby creatures, making movement agonizing for them.
Crackling Burst.onHit: 1d8 lightning damage. If the target moves during its next turn, it takes lightning damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Fox's Feint.name: Fox's Feint
Fox's Feint.flavor: Your blade dances faster than the eye can follow, guiding your foeâ€™s movement as you attack.
Fox's Feint.onHit: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and you can swap positions with the target.
Fox's Feint.aegisOfEnsnarement: Until the end of your next turn, when the target grants combat advantage to an attacker, that attacker gains a +4 bonus to the attack roll instead of a +2 bonus.

Sweeping Frostblade.name: Sweeping Frostblade
Sweeping Frostblade.flavor: You swing your blade in a wide circle, unleashing a freezing wave that numbs nearby foes.
Sweeping Frostblade.onHit: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier cold damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
Sweeping Frostblade.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Ghost Step.name: Ghost Step
Ghost Step.flavor: Like a ghost, you glide unharmed through the battlefield.
Ghost Step.effect: Until the stance ends, whenever you shift, you can shift 1 additional square.

Host of Shields.name: Host of Shields
Host of Shields.flavor: Your weapon produces a few small, glowing shields that orbit your body and ward off blows.
Host of Shields.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex.

Blazing Lunge.name: Blazing Lunge
Blazing Lunge.flavor: You lunge toward your enemy, your blade ablaze with arcane flame.
Blazing Lunge.aegisOfAssault: When making an opportunity attack, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.
Blazing Lunge.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Shadow Snake Lunge.name: Shadow Snake Lunge
Shadow Snake Lunge.flavor: Like the shadow snake, your strike bites with deadly venom. With each movement, your foe suffers from the poison you inflict.
Shadow Snake Lunge.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, when the target uses a move action, it takes poison damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Unseen Gauntlet.name: Unseen Gauntlet
Unseen Gauntlet.flavor: Your words of magic create a gauntleted hand that wraps around your foe, crushing its windpipe and leaving it gasping for breath.
Unseen Gauntlet.onHit: 1d10 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Unseen Gauntlet.aegisOfEnsnarement: The attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Dimensional Bond.name: Dimensional Bond
Dimensional Bond.flavor: Your sword thrust connects you with your foe and creates a dimensional bond that allows you to teleport to its location.
Dimensional Bond.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you can teleport 10 squares as a move action. You must end this movement adjacent to the target.

Quickling Stride.name: Quickling Stride
Quickling Stride.flavor: You move through the battlefield in a blur.

Dazing Rebuke.name: Dazing Rebuke
Dazing Rebuke.flavor: Your sword swing unleashes a barrage of nettling darts of force that punish a foe for attacking one of your allies.
Dazing Rebuke.trigger: An enemy within 5 squares of you hits or misses an ally
Dazing Rebuke.onHit: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Dazing Rebuke.aegisOfShielding: The target also takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Rejuvenating Strike.name: Rejuvenating Strike
Rejuvenating Strike.flavor: Your attack draws life from your foeâ€™s injury and instills you with renewed energy.
Rejuvenating Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage. You can spend a healing surge.
Rejuvenating Strike.aegisOfEnsarement: If you spend a healing surge, you regain additional hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.

Shatterblade.name: Shatterblade
Shatterblade.flavor: In the blink of an eye, your weapon shatters into thousands of pieces that cut your foe. The weapon then reforms in your hand.
Shatterblade.onHit: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier damage. Each creature other than you that is adjacent to the target takes damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your Strength modifier.

Troll Rampage.name: Troll Rampage
Troll Rampage.flavor: You charge your foe, swinging your weapon savagely. As arcane energy fuels your charge, a few of your minor wounds heal.
Troll Rampage.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage. Until the end of the encounter, you gain regeneration equal to 2 + your Constitution modifier while you are bloodied.
Troll Rampage.onMiss: Half damage. You regain hit points equal to 2 + your Constitution modifier.
Troll Rampage.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.
Troll Rampage.aegisOfEnsnarement: If you charge, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll instead of the normal +1 for charging.

Thunderclap Strike.name: Thunderclap Strike
Thunderclap Strike.flavor: Raising your blade, you send out a clap of thunder that sends your foes sprawling as noise cascades over them.
Thunderclap Strike.onHit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier thunder damage, and you knock the target prone.

Feywild Grace.name: Feywild Grace
Feywild Grace.flavor: You move with otherworldly grace through even the most difficult environments.
Feywild Grace.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain a +2 power bonus to speed and a +2 power bonus to Athletics checks, Acrobatics checks, and Stealth checks, and you ignore difficult terrain.

Spider's Leap.name: Spider's Leap
Spider's Leap.flavor: Like the deathjump spider, you can pounce upon your prey with frightening speed.
Spider's Leap.effect: You make an Athletics check to jump with a +10 power bonus. You are considered to have a running start and can move as far as the check allows.
Spider's Leap.aegisOfEnsnarement: When you charge, you can use this power as a free action.

Hypnotic Swordplay.name: Hypnotic Swordplay
Hypnotic Swordplay.flavor: With a mesmerizing twirl of your weapon, you make your opponentâ€™s mind reel and rob the creature of its ability to react.
Hypnotic Swordplay.onHit: Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is stunned until the end of your next turn.
Hypnotic Swordplay.aegisOfEnsnarement: If the target is marked by your aegis of ensnarement, the psychic damage equals your Intelligence modifier + your Constitution modifier.

Ensnaring Bolts.name: Ensnaring Bolts
Ensnaring Bolts.flavor: Bolts of purple lightning jet from your blade and rip at your foes, pulling them toward you.
Ensnaring Bolts.onHit: 1d10 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage, and you pull the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.
Ensnaring Bolts.aegisOfEnsnarement: The target is also slowed until the end of your next turn.

Fist of Force.name: Fist of Force
Fist of Force.flavor: Your foe might be expecting a strike of the sword, but instead it gets a force-empowered fist in the face.
Fist of Force.aegisOfAssault: The attack deals extra damage equal to your Strength modifier.
Fist of Force.effect: You push the target a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier and knock it prone.

Burning Mantle.name: Burning Mantle
Burning Mantle.flavor: As your sword connects with your foeâ€™s flesh, your body ignites into an aspect of fiery doom.
Burning Mantle.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage. Until the end of the encounter, each creature that starts its turn adjacent to you takes 5 fire damage.
Burning Mantle.aegisOfAssault: When you use your aegis of assault to teleport and make an attack, you can use this power in place of the melee basic attack.

Unerring Parry.name: Unerring Parry
Unerring Parry.flavor: With a quick flick of the wrist and a spell on the lips, you can guard yourself against the worst attacks.
Unerring Parry.effect: The triggering attack deals half damage to you.

Firelasher's Lunge.name: Firelasher's Lunge
Firelasher's Lunge.flavor: Flame licks your blade, then explodes in a fiery blast when you strike your foe.
Firelasher's Lunge.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier fire damage. Each enemy adjacent to the target takes fire damage equal to your Strength modifier.
Firelasher's Lunge.aegisOfAssault: When you use your aegis of assault to teleport and make an attack, you can use this power in place of the melee basic attack.
Firelasher's Lunge.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Boundless.name: Boundless
Boundless.flavor: You wreath yourself in magic and unleash a burst of energy that lets you overcome even the most paralyzing afflictions.
Boundless.effect: End any effects on you that impose the following conditions: grabbed, immobilized, restrained, slowed, and petrified. Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +5 power bonus to saving throws against any effects that include those conditions.

Oni's Gift.name: Oni's Gift
Oni's Gift.flavor: Like the oni of childrenâ€™s fairy tales, you can disappear from view until you are ready to strike.
Oni's Gift.effect: You are invisible until the end of your next turn or until you attack.
Oni's Gift.sustainMinor: You stay invisible or, if you are no longer invisible because you attacked, you become invisible again.

Aegis Bolt.name: Aegis Bolt
Aegis Bolt.flavor: You send a missile of force flying toward a distant foe, marking it for your wrath.
Aegis Bolt.onHit: 4d8 + Intelligence modifier force damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target is marked by your Swordmage Aegis power. Marking the target does not remove the mark on another target already affected by your Swordmage Aegis.

Waves of Languor.name: Waves of Languor
Waves of Languor.flavor: With a sweep of your sword, you unleash a flood of energy that pacifies your foes, making them weak and sleepy.
Waves of Languor.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is slowed and weakened (save ends both).
Waves of Languor.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed and weakened until the end of your next turn.

Mindsap Maneuver.name: Mindsap Maneuver
Mindsap Maneuver.flavor: Your arcane swordplay daunts your foe and leaves it scrambling to use even its simplest attacks.
Mindsap Maneuver.onHit: 4[W] + Intelligence modifier damage. The target can use only basic attacks to attack (save ends).
Mindsap Maneuver.onMiss: Half damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target can use only basic attacks to attack.

Invincible Rampage.name: Invincible Rampage
Invincible Rampage.flavor: Magic washes over you, steeling your body against pain as you rain violence upon your foe.
Invincible Rampage.onHit: 3[W] + Intelligence modifier damage. Until the end of the encounter, you gain regeneration 10 while you are bloodied.
Invincible Rampage.effect: You can spend a healing surge.
Invincible Rampage.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.
Invincible Rampage.aegisOfEnsnarement: If you charge, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll instead of the normal +1 for charging.

Slash and Burn.name: Slash and Burn
Slash and Burn.flavor: Brandishing your sword in one hand, you slash at your enemy while striking it with a flaming fist that leaves it reeling.
Slash and Burn.onHit: Intelligence modifier fire damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier. Also, the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Thundering Burst.name: Thundering Burst
Thundering Burst.flavor: You slam your sword into the ground and send a sonorous boom outward.
Thundering Burst.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier thunder damage. If the target moves before the end of your next turn, it takes 2d8 + your Constitution modifier thunder damage.
Thundering Burst.aegisOfEnsnarement: The target is also slowed until the end of your next turn.

Mirrorblade Army.name: Mirrorblade Army
Mirrorblade Army.flavor: From your image reflected in your blade, you conjure an army of duplicates to help assault your foes anywhere on the battlefield.
Mirrorblade Army.effect:
You conjure a number of mirror images of yourself equal to your Constitution modifier (minimum 1) within range. Each mirror image occupies 1 square. Enemies cannot move through an imageâ€™s space, but allies can.
You can make attacks, including opportunity attacks, as though you occupied the same space as a mirror image. A mirror image still provokes opportunity attacks as normal for using a ranged or an area attack.
A mirror image can be targeted by attacks. It has the same defenses, resistances, and immunities as you. A mirror image has 1 hit point, and a missed attack never damages it. A mirror image reduced to 0 hit points is destroyed. Otherwise, the conjurations last until the end of your next turn.

Constrictor's Strike.name: Constrictor's Strike
Constrictor's Strike.flavor: You exhibit your mastery of the battlefield as you harry your foe and control its movements, making it unable to escape your blade.
Constrictor's Strike.effect: The target is immobilized (save ends). Until the end of the encounter, whenever you hit the target with a melee attack, it is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Constrictor's Strike.aegisOfEnsnarement: The target is restrained instead of immobilized.

Ghost Walk.name: Ghost Walk
Ghost Walk.flavor: Your form becomes immaterial like a ghost, and you gain the power to pass through walls.
Ghost Walk.effect: You become insubstantial and gain phasing until the end of your next turn.

Freezing Swordburst.name: Freezing Swordburst
Freezing Swordburst.flavor: Ice creeps over your weapon, and when you strike, it explodes in a cloud of frost that anchors nearby foes in eldritch ice.
Freezing Swordburst.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier cold damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn. Make a secondary attack that is an area burst 1 implement attack centered on the primary target. The secondary attack does not provoke opportunity attacks.
Freezing Swordburst.secondaryTarget: Each creature in the burst except you
Freezing Swordburst.secondaryOnHit: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier cold damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Freezing Swordburst.aegisOfAssault: When you use your aegis of assault to teleport and make an attack, you can use this power in place of the melee basic attack.

Bravado Strike.name: Bravado Strike
Bravado Strike.flavor: Your successful attack lends you the strength and the inspiration to keep on fighting.
Bravado Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Intelligence modifier damage. You can spend a healing surge and regain additional hit points equal to your Constitution modifier. You can also roll a saving throw.

Dimensional Warp.name: Dimensional Warp
Dimensional Warp.flavor: You reach out with arcane power, and two of your nearby allies suddenly wink out and reappear in each otherâ€™s places.
Dimensional Warp.target: You and one ally in the burst or two allies in the burst
Dimensional Warp.effect: Each target teleports into the otherâ€™s space. Both targets must occupy the same size space, or the power fails.

Acid Fountain.name: Acid Fountain
Acid Fountain.flavor: Your blade changes into a whirling geyser of acid.

Quicksilver Blade.name: Quicksilver Blade
Quicksilver Blade.flavor: Arcane power courses through your veins and grants you unearthly speed with your biting blade.
Quicksilver Blade.effect: Once per round, you can make a melee basic attack as a minor action.

Frigid Blade.name: Frigid Blade
Frigid Blade.flavor: Your weapon leaves a frosty trail as it cuts through the air and strikes with a blow that inflicts winterâ€™s wrath.
Frigid Blade.onHit:
1[W] + Intelligence modifier cold damage. If the target starts its next turn adjacent to you, it takes a penalty to speed equal to your Constitution modifier until the end of its next turn.
Increase damage to 2[W] + Intelligence modifier at 21st level.

Dimensional Thunder.name: Dimensional Thunder
Dimensional Thunder.flavor: As you pass unseen through dimensional space, you leave in your wake a thunderous roar that bombards enemies upon your arrival.
Dimensional Thunder.effect: Each enemy adjacent to you gains ongoing 5 thunder damage (save ends).

Elemental Aegis.name: Elemental Aegis
Elemental Aegis.flavor: You raise an aegis in your allyâ€™s defense, infusing the shield with elemental energy to help defend against certain attacks.
Elemental Aegis.trigger: An enemy you have marked attacks an ally.
Elemental Aegis.effect: Choose a damage type: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. Your ally gains resistance to that damage type equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier until the end of your next turn.

Incendiary Sword.name: Incendiary Sword
Incendiary Sword.flavor: Your weapon ignites with flames as you launch it toward your enemies. Upon striking the ground, it explodes and consumes the area in flames.
Incendiary Sword.requirement: You must throw your melee weapon at the origin square.
Incendiary Sword.onHit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage, and the target takes 5 fire damage if it makes an attack that does not include you on its next turn.
Incendiary Sword.effect: Your weapon reforms in your hand.

Swordmage Shielding Fire.name: Swordmage Shielding Fire
Swordmage Shielding Fire.flavor: A gout of flame springs from your sword, searing your enemy and threatening to consume it in deadlier flames.
Swordmage Shielding Fire.onHit: 2d10 + Constitution modifier fire damage, and the creature is marked as if from your Swordmage Aegis power until the end of the encounter. This does not end existing marks placed by your Swordmage Aegis power, and using your Swordmage Aegis power to mark another enemy does not end this mark. Another creatureâ€™s mark supersedes this one.
Swordmage Shielding Fire.onMiss: The creature is marked as if from your Swordmage Aegis power until the end of the encounter. This does not end existing marks placed by your Swordmage Aegis power, and using your Swordmage Aegis power to mark another enemy does not end this mark. Another creatureâ€™s mark supersedes this one.
Swordmage Shielding Fire.aegisOfShielding: Until the end of the encounter, when you reduce the damage the target deals using aegis of shielding, the target takes fire damage equal to the amount of damage your aegis of shielding power prevents.

Variable Defense.name: Variable Defense
Variable Defense.flavor: You summon the strength of the elements to shield you from damage.
Variable Defense.effect: Choose a damage type: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. You have resistance to that damage type equal to your Constitution modifier. As a minor action, you can change the type of resistance to any other listed damage type. This resistance lasts until the end of the encounter.

Sleet Strike.name: Sleet Strike
Sleet Strike.flavor: Your chill blade sends a rain of frozen rain cascading over your enemy, inhibiting its ability to move without slipping.
Sleet Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier cold damage. The target and each enemy adjacent to the target fall prone after shifting until the end of your next turn.

Leaping Flames.name: Leaping Flames
Leaping Flames.flavor: Your attack gives life to a tenacious flame that pursues and burns your enemies long after the initial foe shakes it off.
Leaping Flames.onHit: 1d10 + Intelligence modifier fire damage, and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends, see below).
Leaping Flames.effect: When a creature saves against the ongoing damage from this power, place leaping flames in a square adjacent to that creature. When a creature is in the same square as leaping flames, that creature gains ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends) and you remove leaping flames from the board. This process continues until the end of the encounter, at which point the flames disappear. A creature can be affected by these flames only once in an encounter. If no creature is currently affected by the flames, move the flames 1 square at the start of your turn.
Leaping Flames.onMiss: Half damage, and no ongoing fire damage.

Icy Sweep.name: Icy Sweep
Icy Sweep.flavor: As your weapon sweeps toward your enemyâ€™s feet, it creates an icy patch along the ground that sends your enemy slipping toward another nearby patch of ground.
Icy Sweep.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier cold damage, and you slide the target 3 squares to a square adjacent to you.
Icy Sweep.onMiss: Half damage, and do not slide the target.

Lightning Strider.name: Lightning Strider
Lightning Strider.flavor: Your body becomes like a bolt of lightning as you shoot from enemy to enemy, launching attack after attack.
Lightning Strider.effect: You can teleport 3 squares, and then make a secondary attack.
Lightning Strider.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target.
Lightning Strider.secondaryeffect: You can teleport 2 squares, and then make a tertiary attack.
Lightning Strider.tertiaryTarget: One creature other than the primary and secondary targets.

Aegis of Ensnarement.name: Aegis of Ensnarement
Aegis of Ensnarement.flavor: You create an arcane link between yourself and a foe, allowing you to ensnare that creature.
Aegis of Ensnarement.effect:
You mark the target. The target remains marked until you use this power against another target. If you mark another creature using other powers, the target is still marked.
Until the mark ends, if the target makes any attack that does not include you as a target, it takes a -2 penalty to the attack roll.
If a target marked by this power is within 10 squares of you when it hits with an attack that does not include you as a target, you can use an immediate reaction after the targetâ€™s entire attack is resolved to teleport the target to any space adjacent to you. In addition, the target grants combat advantage to all creatures until the end of your next turn. If no unoccupied space exists adjacent to you, you canâ€™t use this immediate reaction, and the target doesnâ€™t grant combat advantage as a result of this effect.

Sword of Sigils.name: Sword of Sigils
Sword of Sigils.flavor: As you sweep your blade in a wide arc, it glows red and leaves arcane runes burning in the air above your foes.
Sword of Sigils.onHit: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and the target is marked until the end of your next turn. Until the mark ends, if the target makes an attack that does not include you as a target, it takes force damage equal to your Intelligence modifier after the attack is resolved.
Sword of Sigils.aegisOfShielding: If a target marked by this power hits a creature within 10 squares of you with an attack that does not include you as a target, you can use an immediate interrupt to reduce the damage dealt by that attack to any single creature by an amount equal to your Constitution modifier.

Dance of the Sword.name: Dance of the Sword
Dance of the Sword.flavor: Your dazzling display of swordplay and magic captivates your foes and causes them to neglect combat tactics and opportunities.
Dance of the Sword.onHit: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target cannot make opportunity attacks or shift (save ends).
Dance of the Sword.onMiss: Half damage, and until the end of your next turn, the target cannot make opportunity attacks or shift.

Arcane Transport.name: Arcane Transport
Arcane Transport.flavor: You extend your magic to include a nearby friend as you step through an unseen, arcane corridor.
Arcane Transport.trigger: You teleport using a swordmage power
Arcane Transport.effect: The target teleports to a space adjacent to the space you teleport to.

Channeling Shield.name: Channeling Shield
Channeling Shield.flavor: You throw up a temporary shield to absorb some of the power of a foeâ€™s attack.
Channeling Shield.trigger: An attack hits you or an ally within 10 squares of you
Channeling Shield.target: The creature hit by the triggering attack
Channeling Shield.effect: You reduce the damage the target takes from the triggering attack by 5 + your Constitution modifier.
Channeling Shield.aegisOfShielding: The next successful attack you make before the end of your next turn deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Ward of Brilliance.name: Ward of Brilliance
Ward of Brilliance.flavor: A brilliant flash of light shields you and blinds your foe.
Ward of Brilliance.trigger: An enemy marked by you hits you with a melee attack
Ward of Brilliance.effect: You gain a +4 power bonus to AC and Reflex until the end of your next turn. If the triggering enemyâ€™s attack hits you despite the bonus, the triggering enemy is blinded until the end of your next turn.

Dimensional Vortex.name: Dimensional Vortex
Dimensional Vortex.flavor: Lashing out with your sword, you warp space, causing your foe to appear a short distance away and unleash its attack elsewhere.
Dimensional Vortex.trigger: An enemy hits an ally with a melee attack
Dimensional Vortex.onHit: You teleport the target 5 squares. The target then makes its melee attack against a creature you choose. If no creatures are within range of the target, the attack is expended.
Dimensional Vortex.aegisOfShielding: If the target is marked by your aegis of shielding power, the targetâ€™s melee attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Dual Lightning Strike.name: Dual Lightning Strike
Dual Lightning Strike.flavor: Like a forked bolt of lightning, you seem to strike two creatures at once.
Dual Lightning Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier lightning damage, and the target is marked until the end of your next turn.
Dual Lightning Strike.effect: You teleport 5 squares and make a secondary attack.
Dual Lightning Strike.aegisOfAssault: The number of squares you teleport equals 4 + your Strength modifier.
Dual Lightning Strike.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Dual Lightning Strike.secondaryOnHit: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier lightning damage, and the target is marked until the end of your next turn.

Energy Theft.name: Energy Theft
Energy Theft.flavor: You draw on your enemyâ€™s natural resilience to protect your allies from harm.
Energy Theft.effect: Choose acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, necrotic, poison, psychic, radiant, or thunder. The target gains vulnerable 5 to that damage type (save ends). Each ally within 5 squares of you gains resist 5 to that damage type until the end of the encounter.

Enervating Slash.name: Enervating Slash
Enervating Slash.flavor: Your weapon turns pitch black as you strike. The wound it leaves behind drains your enemy of strength when it attacks your allies.
Enervating Slash.effect: The targetâ€™s attacks deal half damage to your allies (save ends).

Mark of the Hound.name: Mark of the Hound
Mark of the Hound.flavor: With a wicked flourish, you carve your mark into the flesh of your foe, enabling you to find the creature wherever it goes.
Mark of the Hound.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you can automatically pinpoint the location of the target while it is within 20 squares of you, even if line of sight or line of effect would normally be blocked. You still take any penalties for any concealment or cover that the creature has against you. Also, until the end of the encounter, you gain the benefit of flanking against the target while you and at least one ally are adjacent to the target.

Purifying Wound.name: Purifying Wound
Purifying Wound.flavor: Your attack inflicts a grievous wound and unleashes a gout of flame that consumes your enemy.
Purifying Wound.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends). When the target takes the ongoing fire damage, each enemy adjacent to the target takes 5 fire damage.

Unicorn's Touch.name: Unicorn's Touch
Unicorn's Touch.flavor: Your blade briefly adopts the appearance of a unicorn horn, sending out a focused pulse of curative energy.
Unicorn's Touch.target: You or one ally in the burst
Unicorn's Touch.effect: The target either rolls a saving throw or regains hit points equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier.

Arcane Deflection.name: Arcane Deflection
Arcane Deflection.flavor: Your blade weaves in a pattern that deflects attacks directed at your nearby allies.
Arcane Deflection.onHit: The triggering enemyâ€™s attack misses the ally.
Arcane Deflection.effect: Until the stance ends, you can use the Arcane Deflection Attack power.
Arcane Deflection.requirement: The Arcane Deflection power must be active to use this power.
Arcane Deflection.trigger: An enemy hits an ally who is adjacent to you
Arcane Deflection.special: Make an Intelligence attack vs. the triggering enemyâ€™s attack roll

Blade Bolt.name: Blade Bolt
Blade Bolt.flavor: Throwing your sword, you transform the weapon into a bolt of lightning that cripples your foe.
Blade Bolt.requirement: You must throw your melee weapon at the target.
Blade Bolt.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier lightning damage, and the target is slowed (save ends). Also, the target is marked by your Swordmage Aegis power. Marking the target does not remove the mark on another target already affected by your Swordmage Aegis.
Blade Bolt.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Blade Bolt.effect: Your weapon returns to your hand.

Forceful Dismissal.name: Forceful Dismissal
Forceful Dismissal.flavor: Bored with your foes, you give them a dismissive wave with your sword that sends them tumbling to the ground.
Forceful Dismissal.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier and knock it prone.
Forceful Dismissal.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.

Hellspike Assault.name: Hellspike Assault
Hellspike Assault.flavor: Your blade bursts into flame as you stab a foe. You and the foe are then whisked away to another enemy.
Hellspike Assault.effect: You teleport to a space that must be adjacent to the secondary target. If you hit the primary target, you can also teleport the primary target to a space adjacent to you.
Hellspike Assault.secondaryTarget: One creature within 5 squares of you other than the primary target

Like a Feather.name: Like a Feather
Like a Feather.flavor: You fear no height, for your magic gives grace to any landing.
Like a Feather.trigger: You are knocked prone or fall
Like a Feather.effect: You take no falling damage, and you are not knocked prone.

Binding Light.name: Binding Light
Binding Light.flavor: As your sword connects with your foe, a burst of arcane light roots nearby enemies to the ground.
Binding Light.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier radiant damage. Each enemy adjacent to you other than the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Binding Light.aegisOfAssault: When you use your aegis of assault to teleport and make an attack, you can use this power in place of the melee basic attack.

Silverlight Strike.name: Silverlight Strike
Silverlight Strike.flavor: Your strike causes silver light to flare around your foe, obscuring its ability to perceive anyone but you.
Silverlight Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier radiant damage. Until the end of your next turn, all your allies are invisible to the target.
Silverlight Strike.aegisOfShielding: The attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Assault of Fiery Cuts.name: Assault of Fiery Cuts
Assault of Fiery Cuts.flavor: Your blade moves in a blur as you assail your foe with cuts. Then, from those cuts, you summon flames to engulf your foe.

bonusPower.name: Assault of Fiery Cuts Secondary Attack
bonusPower.flavor: From those cuts, you summon flames to engulf your foe.

Assault of Fiery Cuts.effect: Make a secondary attack centered on the primary target. The secondary attack does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Death's Blade.name: Death's Blade
Death's Blade.flavor: Your blade pulses with necrotic energy. Your strike creates a wound that festers, causing your foe mind-numbing anguish.
Death's Blade.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier necrotic damage. The target takes ongoing 5 necrotic damage, cannot regain hit points, cannot recharge powers, and cannot spend action points (save ends all).
Death's Blade.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 necrotic damage (save ends).

Hunter's Pursuit.name: Hunter's Pursuit
Hunter's Pursuit.flavor: You gauge your opponentâ€™s moves, attacking where the creature is weakest and cutting off its ability to escape.
Hunter's Pursuit.onHit: 3[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Hunter's Pursuit.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you hit the target with a melee attack, it is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Hunter's Pursuit.aegisOfEnsnarement: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you hit the target with a melee attack, you can knock it prone instead of immobilizing it.

Borrowed Confidence.name: Borrowed Confidence
Borrowed Confidence.flavor: For a brief moment, your doubts and fears are assuaged by an overwhelming sense of confidence that drives you to succeed.
Borrowed Confidence.effect: Until the start of your next turn, when you make an attack roll or a saving throw, you roll twice and use either result.

Shared Fortune.name: Shared Fortune
Shared Fortune.flavor: With a few whispered words of magic, you gain the power to share in an allyâ€™s good fortunes.
Shared Fortune.effect: Choose an ally within 3 squares of you. Until the end of the encounter or until you drop to 0 hit points or fewer, whenever that ally succeeds on a saving throw while you are within his or her line of sight, you can end one effect on you that a save can end.

Shield of Besieged Tower.name: Shield of Besieged Tower
Shield of Besieged Tower.flavor: The more foes stand arrayed against you, the stronger your defensive magic is.
Shield of Besieged Tower.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain a +1 power bonus to AC. If at least two enemies are within 3 squares of you, this bonus increases to +3.

Dazzling Display.name: Dazzling Display
Dazzling Display.flavor: With dizzying speed, you slash and slice your foes. Your swordplay leaves your foes off balance and unable to discern your location.
Dazzling Display.onHit: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target grants combat advantage to you and your allies.
Dazzling Display.effect: Until the end of your next turn or until you move, you have concealment.

Snake Strike.name: Snake Strike
Snake Strike.flavor: Your sword extends into the form of a shadowy asp and bites an enemy. If that foe dares to leave your side, poison assails it a second time.
Snake Strike.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier poison damage. If the target ends its next turn in a space that is not adjacent to you, it takes 1d8 + your Constitution modifier poison damage.

Surprising Transposition.name: Surprising Transposition
Surprising Transposition.flavor: You sever the fabric of reality, transporting an ally to safety while redirecting an enemyâ€™s attack.
Surprising Transposition.trigger: An enemy within 10 squares of you hits an ally with a melee attack
Surprising Transposition.target: One creature other than the triggering enemy or the ally who was hit
Surprising Transposition.attack: Intelligence vs. Fortitude. If the target is an ally, you do not make an attack roll.
Surprising Transposition.onHit: The target swaps positions with the ally, and the target is subject to the triggering enemyâ€™s attack.

Thundering Vortex.name: Thundering Vortex
Thundering Vortex.flavor: A whirlwind of arcane energy lashes out to draw your foes closer to your blade.
Thundering Vortex.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier thunder damage, and you pull the target 2 squares. The target is marked until the end of your next turn.
Thundering Vortex.aegisOfShielding: The target is marked by your aegis of shielding. Marking the target does not remove the mark on another target already affected by your aegis of shielding.

Forceful Rebuke.name: Forceful Rebuke
Forceful Rebuke.flavor: Just as your foes close in on you, your sword strikes send out blasts of force that repel the enemies and send them staggering.
Forceful Rebuke.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.
Forceful Rebuke.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.

Marksman's Vision.name: Marksman's Vision
Marksman's Vision.flavor: With one swipe, you mark your opponent with a burning, magic sigil that distracts your foe and ensures that the creature canâ€™t hide.
Marksman's Vision.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you can see the target of this power even if it is invisible or hidden. You take no penalty to attack rolls against the target for any concealment, total concealment, cover, or superior cover it has, but you cannot see through walls or any other solid barriers. In addition, you gain the benefit of flanking against the target as long as you and at least one ally are adjacent to it.

Planar Shock.name: Planar Shock
Planar Shock.flavor: Your weapon sends an enemy flying through otherworldly space. When the foe returns, it is reeling from the experience.
Planar Shock.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage. You teleport the target 10 squares, and the target is stunned (save ends).
Planar Shock.onMiss: Half damage, and you teleport the target 5 squares.

Ward of Scales.name: Ward of Scales
Ward of Scales.flavor: You form a protective barrier of scintillating, silver dragon scales that strikes an enemy while providing shelter for an ally.
Ward of Scales.trigger: An enemy hits an ally within 5 squares of you
Ward of Scales.effect: The ally who was hit gains resistance to all damage equal to your Constitution modifier until the end of your next turn.

Whirling Threat.name: Whirling Threat
Whirling Threat.flavor: Appearing in a flash of light in the midst of your foes, you are a terror of flashing steel, threatening all adjacent enemies.
Whirling Threat.effect: Until the stance ends, once during each of your turns as a free action, you can mark one enemy that is adjacent to you. The mark lasts until the end of your next turn.
Whirling Threat.onHit: 3[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and the target is marked until the end of your next turn.

Borrowed Ascension.name: Borrowed Ascension
Borrowed Ascension.flavor: You sprout a pair of translucent magic wings that take you aloft to do battle from the skies.
Borrowed Ascension.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a speed of fly 8 (hover). When the effect ends, you float to the ground and do not take falling damage.

Lightning Bolt Charge.name: Lightning Bolt Charge
Lightning Bolt Charge.flavor: You slash your foe and transform into lightning, racing across the battlefield to reappear and strike anew.
Lightning Bolt Charge.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier lightning damage, and you teleport 10 squares.

Darksword Bolt.name: Darksword Bolt
Darksword Bolt.flavor: With a deft toss, you turn your sword into a streak of black lightning. It slams into your foe and causes the creatureâ€™s flesh to rot away.
Darksword Bolt.requirement: You must throw your melee weapon at the target.
Darksword Bolt.onHit: 3[W] + Intelligence modifier lightning and necrotic damage, and ongoing 10 necrotic damage (save ends).
Darksword Bolt.aftereffect: The target takes ongoing 5 necrotic damage (save ends).
Darksword Bolt.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 necrotic damage (save ends).
Darksword Bolt.effect: Your weapon returns to your hand.

Sword Duel.name: Sword Duel
Sword Duel.flavor: An arcane bond connects you to your foe. If the enemy does not face you in battle, your magical power will erode its life.
Sword Duel.effect: Until the end of the encounter, if the target does not attack you during its turn, it takes 10 damage at the end of its turn.

Sword Chaser Assault.name: Sword Chaser Assault
Sword Chaser Assault.flavor: You throw your weapon at an enemy that threatens an ally. Then, in the blink of an eye, you appear beside the foe and seize your sword.
Sword Chaser Assault.trigger: An enemy within 5 squares of you hits an ally with a melee attack
Sword Chaser Assault.requirement: You must throw your melee weapon at the target.
Sword Chaser Assault.onHit: 4[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and you teleport to a space that must be adjacent to the target.
Sword Chaser Assault.effect: Your weapon returns to your hand.

Wrath of the Arctic Wind.name: Wrath of the Arctic Wind
Wrath of the Arctic Wind.flavor: Your blade unleashes a freezing gale that numbs your foe and sends it tumbling.
Wrath of the Arctic Wind.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier cold damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn. In addition, you either slide the target 3 squares or knock it prone.
Wrath of the Arctic Wind.aegisOfAssault: When you use your aegis of assault to teleport and make an attack, you can use this power in place of the melee basic attack.

Silver Lightning Assault.name: Silver Lightning Assault
Silver Lightning Assault.flavor: Your body streaks like silver lightning to a foe, even one you canâ€™t see. Reappearing, your lightning-charged weapon sears your foe.
Silver Lightning Assault.effect: Before the attack, you can teleport 20 squares to a space that must be adjacent to the target. You do not need line of sight to your destination.
Silver Lightning Assault.onHit: 6[W] + Intelligence modifier lightning damage, and you can then teleport back to your original position.

Sword of Soul Rot.name: Sword of Soul Rot
Sword of Soul Rot.flavor: The strike of your blade injures and debilitates your enemy, leaving it unable to heal or replenish itself.
Sword of Soul Rot.onHit: 4[W] + Intelligence modifier necrotic damage. The target takes ongoing 10 necrotic damage, cannot regain hit points, cannot recharge powers, and cannot spend action points (save ends all).
Sword of Soul Rot.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 10 necrotic damage (save ends).

Luring Strike.name: Luring Strike
Luring Strike.flavor: You step behind your foe, strike quickly, and then dart away, drawing the creature after you.
Luring Strike.onHit:
1[W] damage. You shift 1 square and slide the target 1 square into the space you occupied.
Level 21: 2[W] damage.
Luring Strike.effect: Before or after the attack, you can shift 1 square.

Radiant Shield.name: Radiant Shield
Radiant Shield.flavor: Arcane radiance bursts around your foes, searing them while transforming your allies into insubstantial creatures of light.
Radiant Shield.onHit: 3d8 + Intelligence modifier radiant damage, and the target is marked until the end of your next turn.
Radiant Shield.aegisOfShielding: The target is instead marked by your aegis of shielding until the end of your next turn. Marking the target does not remove the mark on another target already affected by your aegis of shielding.
Radiant Shield.effect: Each ally in the burst becomes insubstantial until the end of your next turn.

Steel Tempest.name: Steel Tempest
Steel Tempest.flavor: The air erupts with blades around your foe, cutting any enemy that tries to move through them.
Steel Tempest.onHit: 3[W] + Intelligence modifier damage. The attack creates a zone of whirling blades in a burst 3 centered on the target. The zone lasts until the end of your next turn or until you dismiss it as a minor action. Each enemy that enters the zone or starts its turn there takes 10 damage. An enemy can take this damage only once per turn.

Reaper's Challenge.name: Reaper's Challenge
Reaper's Challenge.flavor: You intercede on your friendâ€™s behalf and enshroud your foe in a specter of death that can only be exorcised by facing you.
Reaper's Challenge.onHit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier necrotic damage and the target is weakened until the end of its next turn.
Reaper's Challenge.effect: Until the end of the encounter, if the target makes an attack that does not include you as a target, the target is weakened until the end of its next turn.

Necromantic Disruption.name: Necromantic Disruption
Necromantic Disruption.flavor: A burst of light from your soul ensures that each enemyâ€™s death brings you greater opportunities to strike them down.
Necromantic Disruption.onHit: 3[W] + Intelligence modifier damage. This damage ignores insubstantial.
Necromantic Disruption.special: If this attack reduces your target to 0 or fewer hit points, you regain the use of this power.

Death's Resurgence.name: Death's Resurgence
Death's Resurgence.flavor: Deathâ€™s power turns your foeâ€™s triumph into a victory of your own. Your pain explodes from you, and as others fall, you draw strength from their defeat.
Death's Resurgence.trigger: You become bloodied or brought to 0 or fewer hit points
Death's Resurgence.effect: You can spend a healing surge. If you do, you regain 1d6 additional hit points for each enemy bloodied or reduced to 0 hit points by this attack.

Death Grip.name: Death Grip
Death Grip.flavor: You assail your foe as a distraction while a crushing skeletal hand of shadows closes its grip around your enemy.
Death Grip.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and you make a secondary attack with combat advantage against the same target.
Death Grip.onMiss: You make the secondary attack against the target.
Death Grip.secondaryOnHit: Ongoing 10 necrotic damage, and the target is restrained and cannot teleport (save ends all).
Death Grip.secondaryOnMiss: Ongoing 5 necrotic damage (save ends), and the target is restrained and cannot teleport until the end of its next turn.

Frostwind Blade.name: Frostwind Blade
Frostwind Blade.flavor: You slice into your foe, and a freezing wind of the Elemental Chaos howls from the wound.
Frostwind Blade.onHit:
1[W] + Intelligence modifier cold damage. A different enemy marked by you within 3 squares of you takes cold damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Level 21: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier cold damage.

Warding Flourish.name: Warding Flourish
Warding Flourish.flavor: Fancy bladework creates a magical buffer between your foes and your friends.
Warding Flourish.onHit: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier force damage, and the target slides 2 squares.
