Warding Flourish.effect: Until the end of your next turn, the target cannot enter a square adjacent to any of your allies. Until then, if an ally moves adjacent to the target and hits it with an attack, the ally can push the target 1 square.

Stride of the Gallant.name: Stride of the Gallant
Stride of the Gallant.flavor: With the rush of wind, you blink to your enemyâ€™s side, darting around the battlefield in a swirl of sword and spell.
Stride of the Gallant.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain teleport 3 as an additional movement mode, but you must end such teleports adjacent to an enemy.

Blades of Fiery Wrath.name: Blades of Fiery Wrath
Blades of Fiery Wrath.flavor: The ambient magic of your unsuccessful attack manifests as countless blades of fire that lash out at nearby enemies.
Blades of Fiery Wrath.trigger: You used a swordmage at-will attack power this turn and did not hit any target with it

Echoes of Sword Magic.name: Echoes of Sword Magic
Echoes of Sword Magic.flavor: You tap into the magic of your failed strike to unleash a mighty barrage of thunder.
Echoes of Sword Magic.trigger: You used a swordmage at-will attack power this turn and did not hit any target with it
Echoes of Sword Magic.onHit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier thunder damage, and the target is marked by your swordmage aegis until the end of your next turn. Marking the target in this way does not remove the mark on another target affected by your swordmage aegis.

Theft of Alacrity.name: Theft of Alacrity
Theft of Alacrity.flavor: You steal the speed of your enemy and use it to leap across the dimensions in pursuit.
Theft of Alacrity.onHit: 2d8 + Intelligence modifier psychic damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
Theft of Alacrity.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Theft of Alacrity.effect: Each time the target rolls a saving throw against this power, you can teleport 5 squares as a free action. You must end this teleportation adjacent to the target.

Dimensional Echoes.name: Dimensional Echoes
Dimensional Echoes.flavor: As you strike, you create an arcane bond between yourself and your foe, allowing you to slip either of you between narrow gaps between the worlds.
Dimensional Echoes.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you can teleport yourself or the target of this power 1 square as a move action.

Price of Ensnarement.name: Price of Ensnarement
Price of Ensnarement.flavor: Your attacks punish those who cannot escape your reach.
Price of Ensnarement.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain a +2 power bonus to damage rolls against slowed or immobilized targets.
Price of Ensnarement.aegisOfEnsnarement: You also gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls against slowed or immobilized targets.

Nimbus of Shielding.name: Nimbus of Shielding
Nimbus of Shielding.flavor: You extend a magical ward around nearby allies.
Nimbus of Shielding.effect: Until the stance ends, your allies gain a +1 power bonus to AC while adjacent to you.
Nimbus of Shielding.aegisOfShielding: Allies instead gain a +1 power bonus to all defenses while adjacent to you.

Armor of Assault.name: Armor of Assault
Armor of Assault.flavor: The magic of your vicious attacks temporarily protects you from harm.
Armor of Assault.effect: Until the stance ends, when you hit with a melee weapon attack you gain a +1 power bonus to all defenses until the start of your next turn.

Blade of Judgment.name: Blade of Judgment
Blade of Judgment.flavor: You pour arcane energy into improving your aegis.
Blade of Judgment.trigger: An ally within 5 squares of you is hit by an enemy you have marked
Blade of Judgment.effect: You teleport the target to a square adjacent to you and make the following attack.
Blade of Judgment.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and the target takes 5 ongoing lightning damage (save ends).
Blade of Judgment.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes 5 extra lightning damage.

Spellbinder's Gift.name: Spellbinder's Gift
Spellbinder's Gift.flavor: A ring of magical energy washes out from you, clinging to your alliesâ€™ weapons.
Spellbinder's Gift.target: Each weapon you or an ally is wielding in the burst
Spellbinder's Gift.effect: Choose fire, cold, lightning, or force. The targeted weapon deals this kind of damage until the end of your next turn.
Spellbinder's Gift.sustainMinor: The effect persists until the end of your next turn.

Evoker's Summoning.name: Evoker's Summoning
Evoker's Summoning.flavor: You summon a foe to your side, lashing out against it.
Evoker's Summoning.onHit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you can teleport the target to a square adjacent to you.

Enervating Challenge.name: Enervating Challenge
Enervating Challenge.flavor: You call forth to your foe, chastising it for its impertinence.
Enervating Challenge.onHit: 1d10 + Intelligence cold damage. You weaken the target until the start of your next turn and can teleport the target to a square adjacent to you.

Rubicant's Assault.name: Rubicant's Assault
Rubicant's Assault.flavor: Ancient words resonate around you as your blade relentlessly assaults your opposition.
Rubicant's Assault.effect: You can teleport 5 squares and make a secondary attack.
Rubicant's Assault.primaryTarget: Each enemy adjacent to you that you can see
Rubicant's Assault.secondaryTarget: One enemy other than a primary target
Rubicant's Assault.secondaryOnHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier cold damage, and the secondary target is dazed (save ends).

Elemental Barrier.name: Elemental Barrier
Elemental Barrier.flavor: You create a barrier of protection for you and your allies.
Elemental Barrier.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter. While in the zone, you and each ally gain resistance to fire, cold, and lightning damage equal to your twice your Intelligence modifier.

Elemental Detention.name: Elemental Detention
Elemental Detention.flavor: The lightning dancing on your blade leaps to your foe and holds it in place.
Elemental Detention.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier lightning damage, and the target is restrained until the end of your next turn.

Calm the Flames.name: Calm the Flames
Calm the Flames.flavor: You cool your enemiesâ€™ ardor for battle by drawing the heat from their bodies.
Calm the Flames.onHit: 3d10 + Intelligence modifier cold damage, and the target is slowed and dazed until the end of your next turn.

Transdimensional Invasion.name: Transdimensional Invasion
Transdimensional Invasion.flavor: You teleport back and forth across the battlefield, dragging your enemies with you as you go.
Transdimensional Invasion.onHit: 5[W] + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you can teleport the target to any square in the burst.
Transdimensional Invasion.onMiss: Half damage, and you can teleport the target to any square in the burst.
Transdimensional Invasion.effect: You can teleport to any square in the burst.

Vanishing Blade.name: Vanishing Blade
Vanishing Blade.flavor: Your sudden departure after striking your foe leaves the enemy casting about to anticipate your next attack.
Vanishing Blade.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and the target is marked until the end of your next turn.
Vanishing Blade.effect: You teleport 5 squares and become invisible until the end of your next turn. Until the end of the encounter, whenever you hit an enemy with a melee attack, you may teleport 3 squares as a free action.

Arcane Lance.name: Arcane Lance
Arcane Lance.flavor: You form a gray lance of sonic energy around your weapon. The concussive force of its strike briefly slows your foe.
Arcane Lance.onHit:
1d8 thunder damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
    Level 21: 2d8 thunder damage.
Arcane Lance.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack. Add your Intelligence modifier to the damage if you charge while mounted.

Dimensional Cleave.name: Dimensional Cleave
Dimensional Cleave.flavor: You teleport your enemy into the path of your waiting blade.
Dimensional Cleave.trigger: You teleport an enemy to a square adjacent to you on your turn.
Dimensional Cleave.aegisOfEnsnarement: Add your Constitution modifier to the damage. In addition, you can use this power as part of the immediate reaction of your aegis of ensnarement.

Binding Aegis.name: Binding Aegis
Binding Aegis.flavor: Your enemy is held fast by invisible magic bonds. If it manages to escape, your retribution is swift.
Binding Aegis.target: One creature marked by your Swordmage Aegis power
Binding Aegis.aftereffect: You can use a free action to teleport up to 10 squares to a square adjacent to the target and use a melee at-will attack power against it.
Binding Aegis.aegisOfEnsnarement: If you hit with this attack, the target falls prone.

Eldritch Quagmire.name: Eldritch Quagmire
Eldritch Quagmire.flavor: Your spell turns the ground beneath your enemiesâ€™ feet into gooey mud, which grasps and slows their movement.
Eldritch Quagmire.effect: You activate an aura 2 that lasts until the end of the encounter or until you deactivate it as a free action. The ground in the aura is difficult terrain for your enemies.
Eldritch Quagmire.aegisOfEnsnarement: When you deactivate the aura, one enemy within 2 squares of you is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Fettering Aegis.name: Fettering Aegis
Fettering Aegis.flavor: The magic of your aegis creates an invisible tether between you and your enemy, preventing it from escaping.
Fettering Aegis.trigger: An enemy that you can see and that is marked by your Swordmage Aegis power willingly moves away from you.
Fettering Aegis.onHit: 1d8 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you pull the target to a square adjacent to you.
Fettering Aegis.aegisOfEnsnarement: The target is then immobilized until the end of its next turn.

Isolating Aegis.name: Isolating Aegis
Isolating Aegis.flavor: Your aegisâ€™s magic robs your foe of allies.
Isolating Aegis.target: One creature marked by your Swordmage Aegis power
Isolating Aegis.onHit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and the target is not considered an ally to its allies and vice versa for the purpose of powers and auras. This effect lasts until the end of the encounter or until the target is no longer marked by your Swordmage Aegis power.
Isolating Aegis.aegisOfEnsnarement: If the target starts its turn adjacent to a creature other than you and is within 10 squares of you, you can use the immediate reaction of your aegis of ensnarement on the target.
Isolating Aegis.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is not considered an ally to its allies and vice versa for the purpose of powers and auras. This effect lasts until the end of your next turn.

Master Dimensional Cleave.name: Master Dimensional Cleave
Master Dimensional Cleave.flavor: When you teleport an enemy, your blade is waiting to strike a withering blow before the enemy realizes where it is.
Master Dimensional Cleave.trigger: You teleport an enemy to a square adjacent to you on your turn.
Master Dimensional Cleave.aegisOfEnsnarement: Add your Constitution modifier to the damage. In addition, you can use this power as part of the immediate reaction of your aegis of ensnarement.

Grandmaster Dimensional Cleave.name: Grandmaster Dimensional Cleave
Grandmaster Dimensional Cleave.flavor: You swing your sword through the air, striking with pinpoint accuracy before your enemy has fully materialized.
Grandmaster Dimensional Cleave.trigger: You teleport an enemy to a square adjacent to you on your turn.
Grandmaster Dimensional Cleave.aegisOfEnsnarement: The attack can score a critical hit on a roll of 18â€“20, and add your Constitution modifier to the damage. In addition, you can use this power as part of the immediate reaction of your aegis of ensnarement.
